New Records: Pablo López reached 200 strikeouts in a season for the first time in his career, becoming the ninth Twins pitcher to do so.
Pablo López set a career-high with 14 strikeouts in a single game, breaking his previous record of 12.
Key Match Events: Pablo López pitched eight dominant innings, giving up only two hits.
Griffin Jax gave up two runs in the ninth inning, leading to the Twins' 2-0 loss.
DJ Stewart hit a two-run double in the ninth inning for the Mets.
The Twins threatened in the bottom of the ninth but failed to score.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Rocco Baldelli praised Pablo López's performance, calling it 'beyond dominant.'
Pablo López expressed pride in reaching the 200 strikeout milestone.
Pablo López reflected on the importance of embracing good performances despite the loss.
Rocco Baldelli highlighted López's strong performance in September.
